component_summary.name: Carousel
component_summary.description: Wraps embla-carousel-react to provide a composable carousel with context, keyboard navigation, prev/next controls, and helper primitives for content and items.

behaviors: Provides CarouselContext with embla api, scrollPrev/scrollNext and canScroll flags.
Supports horizontal or vertical orientation and external setApi callback to expose embla API.
Composable primitives: CarouselContent attaches embla ref; CarouselItem adapts layout based on orientation; CarouselPrevious/Next are buttons that call embla API.
notes: Contains logic for binding embla events and updating canScroll state; keeps complexity encapsulated here.
Duplication risk low; embla integration centralized.
